DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish normal Magnetic Resonance quantitative value ( tissue stiffness , Apparent Diffusion Coefficient value Blood Oxygen Level Determination value renal cortex medullary tissue total renal blood flow ) young Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease patient normal renal function , normal young adult control without Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease normal renal function . Hypothesis : Newer Magnetic Resonance quantitative imaging parameter ( tissue stiffness , Apparent Diffusion Coefficient , Blood Oxygen Level Determination level , Magnetization Transfer renal blood flow ) different value young adult ADPKD patient compare normal volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: New Quantitive MRI Parameters Assessing Kidneys Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion ADPKD participant Male female subject 1830 year age Diagnosis ADPKD Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) > = 60 mL/min ( Chronic Kidney DiseaseEpidemiology Collaboration equation ) Ability provide write , informed consent Exclusion criterion ADPKD participant Clinically significant concomitant systemic disease Subjects Diabetes Mellitus Urinary protein excretion Abnormal urinalysis suggestive concomitant glomerular disease Subjects contraindication , interference MRI assessments Subjects supine blood pressure high 140/90 mm Hg take blood pressure medication Inclusion criterion Normal Volunteers Male female subject 1830 year age Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) > = 60 mL/min ( Chronic Kidney DiseaseEpidemiology Collaboration equation ) Ability provide write , informed consent Exclusion criterion Normal Volunteers Previous personal family history kidney disease Clinically significant concomitant systemic disease Subjects Diabetes Mellitus Urinary protein excretion Abnormal urinalysis suggestive concomitant glomerular disease Subjects contraindication , interference MRI assessments Subjects supine blood pressure high 140/90 mm Hg take blood pressure medication
